title: Woj & Lowe Crossover Part II
description:
ESPN's Zach Lowe joins The Woj Pod for a Part II of our reporting centered on the NBA's return to play, issues surrounding a bubble environment, future challenges for the league, what teams benefit from a layoff, and much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
